00025 class CXLSoftDeleteBehavior extends CXLActiveRecordBehavior
00026 {
00027   //********************************************************************************
00028   //* Member Variables
00029   //********************************************************************************
00030 
00035   protected $_softDeleteColumnName = null;
00040   protected $_softDeleteValues = array( 
00041     0, 
00042     1
00043   );
00044 
00045   //********************************************************************************
00046   //* Properties
00047   //********************************************************************************

00053   public function getSoftDeleteColumnName()
00054   {
00055     return $this->_softDeleteColumnName;
00056   }
00057 
00062   public function setSoftDeleteColumnName( $value )
00063   {
00064     $this->_softDeleteColumnName = $value;
00065   }

00093   public function undelete()
00094   {
00095     if ( $this->_softDeleteColumnName )
00096     {
00097       //  Perform a soft delete if this model allows
00098       if ( $this->hasAttribute( $this->_softDeleteColumnName ) )
00099       {
00100         $this->setAttribute( $this->_softDeleteColumnName, XL::o( $this->_softDeleteValues, 0, 0 ) );
00101         return $this->update( array( $this->_softDeleteColumnName ) );
00102       }
00103     }
00104 
00105     //  Otherwise, not possible
00106     return false;
00107   }
00108 
00109   //********************************************************************************
00110   //*  Event Handlers
00111   //********************************************************************************
00112 
00119   public function beforeDelete( $event )
00120   {
00121     //  Pass it on...
00122     if ( parent::beforeDelete( $event ) )
00123     {
00124       //  We want to be the top of the chain...
00125       if ( $this->_softDeleteColumnName && $event->isValid && ! $event->handled )
00126       {
00127         //  Perform a soft delete if this model allows
00128         if ( $event->getSender()->hasAttribute( $this->_softDeleteColumnName ) )
00129         {
00130           $event->isValid = false;
00131           $event->handled = true;
00132           $event->sender->setAttribute( $this->_softDeleteColumnName, XL::o( $this->_softDeleteValues, 1, 1 ) );
00133 
00134           if ( !$event->sender->update( array( $this->_softDeleteColumnName ) ) ) 
00135             throw new CXLDatabaseException( 'Error saving soft delete row.' );
00136         }
00137       }
00138 
00139       return true;
00140     }
00141 
00142     return false;
00143   }
00144 
00149   public function beforeFind( $event )
00150   {
00151     if ( $this->_softDeleteColumnName && $this->getOwner()->hasAttribute( $this->_softDeleteColumnName ) )
00152     {
00153       //  Merge in the soft delete indicator
00154       $event->getSender()->getDbCriteria()->mergeWith(
00155         array(
00156           'condition' => $this->_softDeleteColumnName . ' = :softDeleteValue',
00157           'params' => array( ':softDeleteValue' => XL::o( $this->_softDeleteValues, 0, 0 ) ),
00158         )
00159       );
00160     }
00161 
00162     //  Pass it on...
00163     return parent::beforeFind( $event );
00164   }
00165 
00166 }
